reg_info.act_under: Public Accountancy Act   Loi sur la comptabilité publique

content.content:
1. The following fees are payable for the grant or renewal of a licence:  1.

Fee for new licence 

$130


2.

Fee for renewal of licence 

150


3.

Fee for renewal of licence, if paid on or before April 30 in the fiscal year before the fiscal year to which renewal relates 

130 O. Reg. 489/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following fees are payable for the grant or renewal of a licence:

1.

Fee for new licence

$130

2.

Fee for renewal of licence

150

3.

Fee for renewal of licence, if paid on or before April 30 in the fiscal year before the fiscal year to which renewal relates

130

O. Reg. 489/01, s. 1.

content.content: 1.1 A rebate in the amount of $75 shall be paid to all licensees holding valid licences as of September 10, 2004. O. Reg. 41/05, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1.1 A rebate in the amount of $75 shall be paid to all licensees holding valid licences as of September 10, 2004. O. Reg. 41/05, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 489/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 489/01, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 489/01, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 489/01, s. 3.
